Articles.Content:
So Obo, said Ejb, "what are we going to do now?"

"I don't know"

"It's over, time to initiate project Monolith"

The Hologram turned on

"Greetings Berbals, if you are listening to this, our species is becoming endangered, and going extinct.

There is only one thing to do now...

When this transmission ends, several Monoliths will be sent out around the system.

these monoliths contain several microbes to start life on another planet.

To start another race in the Berbol system

Eventually, the artifacts we have left, will let whatever creatures that have poped-up in our system to find our lost world, Booster-Speed Berbals."

The monoliths launched, bringing what was left of the Berbal race with them. One landed at a Red Planet, The New Civilization started. They discovered a pyramid on their planet, emitting strange sounds. The New Civilization made a monument, a monument to Ereb the V, conquer of the Floating Rock.

You see, these guys discovered an asteroid around their moon, with a weird black stone (what we know as monoliths). The New Civilization vanished a decade later.

Another monolith went to another planet.

A green planet.

With trees, cacti, and really shiny grass... and Kerbals.

Edited August 20, 2015 by MrWalrus123
